articles.description: Reaction as Jurgen Klopp criticises flat atmosphere as Liverpool thrash West Ham to reach EFL Cup semis plus Premier League news conferences and build-up.
articles.title: Klopp criticises atmosphere as Liverpool reach EFL Cup semis - reaction

articles.description: The company who backed the European Super League, A22, launches a new proposal for men's and women's European Competitions.
articles.title: Super League backers propose new club competition

articles.description: In 2014, Germany unleashed the power of numbers to help them to the World Cup title. Now, even the smallest teams have access to open-source data to arm them on the biggest stage.
articles.title: How World Cup underdogs thrived on data revolution

articles.description: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp says "anyone not in the right shape" to produce an atmosphere for Saturday's top-of-the-table match against Arsenal should "give their ticket somebody else".
articles.title: 'If you're not in right shape, give away your ticket' – Klopp

articles.description: Uefa and Fifa rules banning clubs joining breakaway competitions like the European Super League are unlawful, the European Court of Justice rules.
articles.title: European Super League ban unlawful, says court

articles.description: England and Sydney Sixers all-rounder Tom Curran receives a four-game ban in Australia's Big Bash League after being found guilty of intimidating an umpire.
articles.title: Tom Curran given BBL ban for intimidating umpire

articles.description: Bayern Munich's Harry Kane plans to send his English friends a photo from the beach as he prepares for his first proper winter break.
articles.title: 'I'll text beach pictures' - Kane 'can't wait' for winter break

articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen says rival teams are "not stupid" and will close in on the runaway 2023 world champions next season.
articles.title: Red Bull rivals 'will get closer' after 'unicorn year'

articles.description: Former tennis star Alexandr Dolgopolov reflects on life as a soldier fighting on the frontline for Ukraine.
articles.title: 'Tennis feels like another life' - Ukraine's Dolgopolov

articles.description: Joel Embiid scores more than 30 points and 10 rebounds in 12th straight game as the Philadelphia 76ers beat the Minnesota Timberwolves 127-113.
articles.title: NBA: Sixers' Joel Embiid with longest scoring run in 51 years
